pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, September 9, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit HXOUSE. An announcement and media availability will follow.

Minister of Small Business, Export Promotion and International Trade Mary Ng, and Member of Parliament for Hull-Aylmer Greg Fergus will be in attendance.

HXOUSE
130 Queens Quay East, Toronto

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of the visit
  • Open coverage of the announcement and media availability
  • Media to arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
